passwordRecovery.title: Forgot password?
passwordRecovery.subtitle: Enter your email to reset it

tutorial.sidebarIntro: This is the sidebar. From here you can navigate between the main sections of the portal.
tutorial.goToHome: This button takes you to the Home section.
tutorial.totalVisits: Here you can see the total number of visits you've made to the store.
tutorial.totalSales: Here you can check the total sales made.
tutorial.totalProductsSold: This card shows the number of products sold.
tutorial.salesGrowth: Here you can see the sales growth compared to the previous month.
tutorial.salesChart: This chart shows the sales trend over the months.
tutorial.topProducts: Here you can see the top 5 products sold to the store.
tutorial.contacts: In this table you can find the contacts for support or inquiries.
tutorial.goToInvoices: This button takes you to the Invoices section.
tutorial.selectDocType: To query documents, first enter the document type you want to query.
tutorial.enterDateRange: Then enter the date range and click the Consult button.
tutorial.invoicesTable: Here the invoices registered according to the consulted parameters are displayed.
tutorial.viewDetail: To view your documents in more detail, click this button.
tutorial.masterDetail: Here you can see the detailed information of your selected document.
tutorial.childDetail: On the right, associated with the master document, you can see related documents and their movements.
tutorial.goToPayments: This button takes you to the Payments section.
tutorial.paymentsTable: Here you can check the payments made.
tutorial.goToReturns: This button takes you to the Returns section.
tutorial.returnsTable: Here you can view your recorded returns.
tutorial.goToCertificates: This button takes you to the Certificates section.
tutorial.certificatesTable: Here you can check your tax certificates.
